review_title: Its Good to Work with London School of Commerc

pros: Healthy Work Environment, Excellent team management, respect in the workplace and flexible hours.
cons: Working environment can be challenging at times, some tasks have outside interference and make it difficult to complete, but management and peers help you get through.

pros: Flexible Wok Timing with lots of Individual Contribution Oppurunities
